body.name: RCA RPJ140 Projector With Built-in Bluetooth & DVD Player - Movie Projector - 1080P Supported For HD, Video & Screens - Portable DVD Projector For Home Theater Compatible With Phone, Laptop, PS4, Xbox
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Thousands of Electronics.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 2 mins
features: PROJECTOR & DVD PLAYER : Unlike many other projectors, the RCA RPJ140 1080p projector has a built-in DVD player and supports direct playback of CD, DVD, and VCD, to mention a few, on a large screen. This makes it a perfect option for filling in your free time at home, without having to get a separate DVD player.

BLUETOOTH & SURROUND SPEAKER: Build-In stereo surround speaker, restored every detail sound effect to let you enjoy the pleasure sounds in different scenes. With Bluetooth, You can connect your ideal Bluetooth speaker wirelessly at any time

COMPATIBLE DEVICES: Supports direct play of CD, DVD, CD-R/RW, DVD -R/+R, DVD+RW/-RW, VCD, SVCD (but not Blu-ray DVD), and it has HDMI, AV, VGA, Micro SD card port, which allows you to use it with laptop, PCs, TV box, Fire TV stick, Chrome book, tablets, blu-ray DVD player, Micro SD card, USB flash drive, media players, iPad, iPhone, Android Smartphones
QUIET ENVIRONMENT: 80% less fan noise for superior performance. A newly-enhanced cooling and fan system generates the surprisingly low noise of any home projector

TWO-IN-ONE: 2022 upgraded, Projector & DVD player: LED lighting with built in DVD player, supporting 1920x1080 resolution, 3000: 1 contrast ratio which is ideal for home entertainment. Not recommend for ppt or office presentation
body.description: RCA Projector Bluetooth & Built-in DVD Player, Movie Portable Projector with WiFi- for Android, 1080P Supported for HD, Video & Screens, Silver

productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 890 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built-in innovative DVD Function The RCA movie projector with DVD Player provides you with amazing home entertainment. You can Play DVD, VCD, DVR and many other types of discs directly without spending extra much money to buy a dvd player. Easy to Connect various Equipments Mini projector with Multiple Digital Connection Options: Supports direct play of CD, DVD, CD-R/RW, DVD -R/+R, DVD+RW/-RW, VCD, SVCD (but not Blu-ray DVD), and it has HDMI, AV, VGA, Micro SD card port, which allows you to use it with laptop, PCs, TV box, Fire TV stick, Chrome book, tablets, blu-ray DVD player, Micro SD card, USB flash drive, media players, iPad, iPhone, Android Smartphones Enjoy a cinema-like experience freely anytime. Supporting 1920x1080 resolution. A Built-in powerful speaker gives you a great auditory sense experience even without any external audio device. Easy to use Control all functions from the comfort of your seat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this to replace the tv in our bedroom and wanted to connect some sort of Roku or fire stick but the Firestick would show picture but no sound and then we gave up and bought a Roku but had difficulties with it but that wasn’t the projectors fault it was faulty and we had to return it we havnt tried the Roku again but we use the switch and ps4 and it works amazing the sound is surprisingly loud no need for Bluetooth speaker if used inside if you use outside or just want a louder sound we connected a Bluetooth speaker and it works amazing too we also connected it via aux cord cause I didn’t read the instructions on how to Bluetooth it but definitely 100% worth it and the DVD player is a definite plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Used this for the first time yesterday and love it! I do recommend using a Bluetooth speaker in addition to the one built into the projector because the speaker is not very loud, and the fan is a little louder than I’d hoped, but the price on this unit to me is well worth it, just so happy to finally view my DVD’s in my room and whenever I want to ( I rent a room and there just isn’t space for tv and all that). It’s a nice small projector yet it projects a fairly large screen onto my wall. I’m so impressed with it, and very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, lightweight and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: We like to do outdoor movies at home and camping and sometimes WiFi isn’t avail or strong enough to stream movies. So I was looking for a small, lightweight projector that had a DVD player instead of Hulu or Amazon. They’re hard to find! But this has been great! We’ve already had many family nights around the fire Watching movies under the stars.The sound is a little weak, so I suggest hooking it up to a Bluetooth speaker. It’s super easy to set up. Grab a movie, extension cord, a Speaker, blankets, a pillow and get settled in.I still can’t get the clarity perfect, either the words are slightly blurry or the picture is, but it does the job and I’m happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use I bought it for my Sunday school kiddos to show religious DvD s I found a gamer case at five below and it is perfect to protect from dust and impact good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: Picture was perfect, used the projector for outdoor movie night at the campground. The only downfall we found was the sound needed a boost, and we had to dig around to find a headphone cable because Bluetooth wasn’t loud enough. Everyone loved the picture quality, and the price was great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't turn on
reviews.reviewText: Just received it and tried plugging it in and turning it on. Jo matter what I try it won't turn on I followed all the instructions on troubleshooting but it still won't turn on. Very disappointed I spent a lot of money on this for nothing. It's perfect for what I wanted it just won't turn on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fan is noisier than our last projector
reviews.reviewText: Van makes a lot of noise. Okay when using with Bluetooth speaker. DVD player is nice feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this unit in order to provide an outdoor theater environment for our four grandchildren. All I can say is that this was a definite fantastic buy. Picture quality was fantastic and was what I’d have expected from a much more expensive unit. Sound quality was also good especially when paired via Bluetooth to an external speaker.
Love it projector. The only down side is the fan is a bit loud. Have to turn up the volume all the way. But great picture.
Horrible purchase. Worst 200$ I’ve spent. The noise the fan makes is obnoxious and is louder than the actual audio itself. It defeats the whole purpose when I can’t even enjoy my movie in peace.
DVD player great for comedies and bright videos. Any movie with dark background doesn't show up well

reviews.reviewTitle: ITEM ARRIVED DAMAGED ON OFF BUTTON BROKEN
reviews.reviewText: PRODUCT ARRIVED DAMAGEDINTERNAL SOUND IS POORAM TRYING TO ORDER AN ETERNAL SPEAKER TO SEE IF THAT HELPSSELLER REFUSES TO SEND A REPLACEMENT ITEMINSTRUCTIONS HARD TO FOLLOWTHERE IS NO MANUFACTURER NUMBER THAT ACTUALLY WORKS NOR RCA STORESOUND IS BARELY AUDIBLE

reviews.reviewTitle: Audio was bad. Only could hear the fan not the movie
reviews.reviewText: Quality of picture is great. It was easy to use. Just the fan noise over powered the sound for the movie
